title: RBCFTools Copilot Instructions
text: RBCFTools R package bundles bcftools htslib reading/manipulating VCF/BCF genomic variant files. provides: - Bundled native tools: bcftools (v1.23), htslib (v1.23), bgzip, tabix—external installation needed - Arrow streaming: VCF→Arrow conversion via nanoarrow structured VEP/CSQ/BCSQ/ANN parsing - DuckDB integration: Custom bcf_reader extension direct SQL queries VCF/BCF files + Parquet export (VEP/CSQ/BCSQ/ANN fields parsed) - Cloud support: built libcurl, reads S3, GCS, HTTP directly Platform: Unix-like (Linux, macOS). Windows supported.
